lategameplus.config.elytra.protection_le: 0 = None, 1 = Golden Guard, 2 = Iron’d Ward (default), 3 = Diamond’s Shield, 4 = Netherite’s Eternal Guard. (Type "/lategameplus reload")
lategameplus.config.totem.netherite_uses: How oft may thou defy Death? (1-16). World must be renew’d.
lategameplus.config.totem.void_uses.desc: How oft may thou slip ‘neath the abyss, yet breathe anew? (1-16). World must be renew’d.
lategameplus.config.piglin_brute.drop_ch: What chance hath the brutish swine to bestow his glitter (0-100%). (Type "/lategameplus reload")
lategameplus.config.piglin_brute.nugget_: The smallest wealth he may bequeath (0-16). (World renew’d)
The greatest wealth he may bestow (0-16). (World renew’d)
lategameplus.config.repair.nugget_percen: Each shard restoreth a measure. Ingot mendeth 25%; shard mendeth ~5.6%. (Type "/lategameplus reload")
lategameplus.config.lodestone.warp_coold: How long must thou tarry ere thy compass bewitch’d awakens anew.
lategameplus.config.lodestone.warp_acros: If true, thou mayest stride o’er realms; if false, thou art bound to thine own.
lategameplus.config.lodestone.warp_coold: The measure of time till thy compass may once more perform its sorcery.
lategameplus.config.crossbow.damage_mult: Bid the Netherite crossbow's quarrel strike as thou desirest. 1.0 = mortal strength, 1.5 = the present boon.
lategameplus.config.anvil.max_cost.desc: The utmost levels the Netherite anvil shall exact ere it stay the cost (20-39).
